issues.description: As a systems engineer, I want to design and implement fail-safe mechanisms within the traffic control system, so that I can ensure continued safe operation in the event of a system failure or cyber incident.

issues.description: Create a detailed plan outlining procedures for identifying, containing, eradicating, and recovering from security incidents to minimize impact and ensure swift restoration of services.

issues.description: Integrate environmental data to adapt traffic operations for various weath conditions and improve overall system resilience.*Acceptance Criteria:** System receives and processes real-time weather data from integrated stations* Signal timing and intensity automatically adjust based on weather conditions (rain, snow, fog, daylight)* Road surface conditions are monitored with appropriate safety protocols triggered* Emergency weather protocols activate automatically during severe conditions* Air quality monitoring is integrated with emission reduction optimization* Environmental impact reports are generated regularly* System integrates with smart city environmental monitoring platforms* Climate resilience strategies are supported through adaptive system responses
issues.summary: Weather and Environmental Adaptation
issues.creator: Austin Alexander

issues.description: Implement predictive maintenance and comprehensive system health monitoring for traffic infrastructure.*Acceptance Criteria:** Predictive maintenance algorithms analyze IoT sensor data to forecast equipment failures* Remote diagnostics automatically detect and report system faults* Equipment lifecycle is tracked with proactive replacement planning* Maintenance scheduling and work orders are managed through integrated systems* Component performance and degradation are continuously monitored and analyzed* Automated alerts notify relevant personnel of maintenance needs* System integrates with city maintenance and public works departments* Equipment inventory and spare parts are tracked and managed* Maintenance costs are optimized with budget planning tools* Energy consumption is monitored and optimized across all system components
issues.summary: Maintenance & System Health Management
issues.creator: Austin Alexander

issues.description: Develop comprehensive user-facing applications and accessible interface systems that provide real-time traffic information, universal accessibility features, and seamless system interaction capabilities for all users, including those with disabilities, while ensuring multilingual support and public transportation integration.h3. Acceptance Criteria:* Signal displays provide color-blind accessible alternatives with shapes, patterns, and high contrast options* Audio signals and tactile feedback systems support visually impaired users* Extended crossing times accommodate users with mobility challenges* Multi-language support is available across all digital displays and interfaces* System complies with ADA and WCAG accessibility standards using universal design principles* Mobile apps provide real-time traffic information and signal timing data* Pedestrian crossing requests and timing information are accessible through user interfaces* Public transportation schedules are integrated and coordinated with traffic systems* Users can report traffic conditions and provide crowd-sourced data* Push notifications alert users to traffic disruptions and important updates* Integration with popular navigation and mapping applications is functional* Offline functionality provides access to essential features without internet connectivity* User feedback collection mechanisms support continuous system improvement
issues.summary: Mobile Application & Public Interface
issues.creator: Austin Alexander

issues.description: Develop a comprehensive central management platform for monitoring, controlling, and coordinating the entire traffic network.h3. Acceptance Criteria:* Centralized traffic operations center dashboard provides comprehensive network oversight* Network-wide traffic signal monitoring and control capabilities are operational* System health monitoring automatically generates alerts for issues and anomalies* Multi-user access controls implement role-based permissions for different operator levels* Real-time performance metrics are displayed and tracked across all system components* Historical data storage and retrieval systems maintain comprehensive operational records* Configuration management and system deployment tools enable efficient system updates* Backup and disaster recovery capabilities ensure system continuity and data protection* Integration with regional traffic management networks enables coordinated operations* Operator training and simulation environments support staff development and system testing
issues.summary: Central Traffic Management System
issues.creator: Austin Alexander

issues.description: Implement comprehensive Vehicle-to-Infrastructure (V2I) communication and autonomous vehiclecoordination capabilities.
issues.summary: Connected & Autonomous Vehicle Integration
issues.creator: Austin Alexander

issues.description: Create comprehensive route optimization and priority management capabilities for specialized vehicle operations, including logistics, delivery services, commercial vehicles, and emergency response systems, with integrated traffic management for both routine operations and emergency situations.h3. Acceptance Criteria:* Dynamic route optimization algorithms provide efficient routing for delivery and commercial vehicles* Commercial and emergency vehicle detection systems identify and prioritize specialized traffic* Integration with logistics, fleet management, and emergency dispatch systems is operational* Delivery time windows are optimized using traffic predictions and real-time conditions* Freight corridors and truck-specific routing accommodate commercial vehicle needs* Emergency vehicle signal preemption creates automatic green light corridors* Multi-modal transportation coordination supports various vehicle types and priorities* Construction zone routing mitigates traffic impact for all vehicle categories* Mass evacuation and emergency traffic management protocols are implemented* Real-time traffic sharing with navigation apps supports system-wide optimization* Post-incident traffic restoration systems return normal operations efficiently* Multi-agency coordination enables emergency traffic management across jurisdictions* Performance metrics track logistics efficiency and emergency response improvements
issues.summary: Route Optimization & Logistics Integration
issues.creator: Preston D

issues.description: Create an Al-powered traffic signal control system that dynamically optimizes timing and priority based on real-time conditions and predictive analytics.
issues.summary: Intelligent Signal Control & Optimization Engine
issues.creator: Preston D

issues.description: Develop a comprehensive sensor network and data collection system to monitor real-time traffic conditionsand vehicle patterns.
issues.summary: Real-time Traffic Detection & Data Collection Platform
issues.creator: Preston D

issues.description: Establish a comprehensive cybersecurity and safety framework to protect the traffic control infrastructurefrom cyber threats and ensure fail-safe operations for public safety.Acceptance Criteria:- Zero data breaches or security incidents- Full compliance with relevant data protection regulations- Successful security audit certification
issues.summary: Critical Infrastructure Security & Safety Framework
issues.creator: Abegaz

epics.description: Integrate environmental data to adapt traffic operations for various weath conditions and improve overall system resilience.*Acceptance Criteria:** System receives and processes real-time weather data from integrated stations* Signal timing and intensity automatically adjust based on weather conditions (rain, snow, fog, daylight)* Road surface conditions are monitored with appropriate safety protocols triggered* Emergency weather protocols activate automatically during severe conditions* Air quality monitoring is integrated with emission reduction optimization* Environmental impact reports are generated regularly* System integrates with smart city environmental monitoring platforms* Climate resilience strategies are supported through adaptive system responses
epics.creator: Austin Alexander

epics.description: Implement predictive maintenance and comprehensive system health monitoring for traffic infrastructure.*Acceptance Criteria:** Predictive maintenance algorithms analyze IoT sensor data to forecast equipment failures* Remote diagnostics automatically detect and report system faults* Equipment lifecycle is tracked with proactive replacement planning* Maintenance scheduling and work orders are managed through integrated systems* Component performance and degradation are continuously monitored and analyzed* Automated alerts notify relevant personnel of maintenance needs* System integrates with city maintenance and public works departments* Equipment inventory and spare parts are tracked and managed* Maintenance costs are optimized with budget planning tools* Energy consumption is monitored and optimized across all system components
epics.creator: Austin Alexander

epics.description: Develop comprehensive user-facing applications and accessible interface systems that provide real-time traffic information, universal accessibility features, and seamless system interaction capabilities for all users, including those with disabilities, while ensuring multilingual support and public transportation integration.h3. Acceptance Criteria:* Signal displays provide color-blind accessible alternatives with shapes, patterns, and high contrast options* Audio signals and tactile feedback systems support visually impaired users* Extended crossing times accommodate users with mobility challenges* Multi-language support is available across all digital displays and interfaces* System complies with ADA and WCAG accessibility standards using universal design principles* Mobile apps provide real-time traffic information and signal timing data* Pedestrian crossing requests and timing information are accessible through user interfaces* Public transportation schedules are integrated and coordinated with traffic systems* Users can report traffic conditions and provide crowd-sourced data* Push notifications alert users to traffic disruptions and important updates* Integration with popular navigation and mapping applications is functional* Offline functionality provides access to essential features without internet connectivity* User feedback collection mechanisms support continuous system improvement
epics.creator: Austin Alexander

epics.description: Develop a comprehensive central management platform for monitoring, controlling, and coordinating the entire traffic network.h3. Acceptance Criteria:* Centralized traffic operations center dashboard provides comprehensive network oversight* Network-wide traffic signal monitoring and control capabilities are operational* System health monitoring automatically generates alerts for issues and anomalies* Multi-user access controls implement role-based permissions for different operator levels* Real-time performance metrics are displayed and tracked across all system components* Historical data storage and retrieval systems maintain comprehensive operational records* Configuration management and system deployment tools enable efficient system updates* Backup and disaster recovery capabilities ensure system continuity and data protection* Integration with regional traffic management networks enables coordinated operations* Operator training and simulation environments support staff development and system testing
epics.creator: Austin Alexander

epics.description: Implement comprehensive Vehicle-to-Infrastructure (V2I) communication and autonomous vehiclecoordination capabilities.
epics.creator: Austin Alexander

epics.description: Create comprehensive route optimization and priority management capabilities for specialized vehicle operations, including logistics, delivery services, commercial vehicles, and emergency response systems, with integrated traffic management for both routine operations and emergency situations.h3. Acceptance Criteria:* Dynamic route optimization algorithms provide efficient routing for delivery and commercial vehicles* Commercial and emergency vehicle detection systems identify and prioritize specialized traffic* Integration with logistics, fleet management, and emergency dispatch systems is operational* Delivery time windows are optimized using traffic predictions and real-time conditions* Freight corridors and truck-specific routing accommodate commercial vehicle needs* Emergency vehicle signal preemption creates automatic green light corridors* Multi-modal transportation coordination supports various vehicle types and priorities* Construction zone routing mitigates traffic impact for all vehicle categories* Mass evacuation and emergency traffic management protocols are implemented* Real-time traffic sharing with navigation apps supports system-wide optimization* Post-incident traffic restoration systems return normal operations efficiently* Multi-agency coordination enables emergency traffic management across jurisdictions* Performance metrics track logistics efficiency and emergency response improvements
epics.creator: Preston D

epics.description: Create an Al-powered traffic signal control system that dynamically optimizes timing and priority based on real-time conditions and predictive analytics.
epics.creator: Preston D

epics.description: Develop a comprehensive sensor network and data collection system to monitor real-time traffic conditionsand vehicle patterns.
epics.summary: Real-time Traffic Detection & Data Collection Platform
epics.creator: Preston D

epics.description: Establish a comprehensive cybersecurity and safety framework to protect the traffic control infrastructurefrom cyber threats and ensure fail-safe operations for public safety.Acceptance Criteria:- Zero data breaches or security incidents- Full compliance with relevant data protection regulations- Successful security audit certification
epics.creator: Abegaz

stories.description: As a developer, I want to explore the required technology, NextJS, so I can understand its capabilities and limitations before implementing the project increment
stories.creator: Austin Alexander

stories.description: As an emergency management coordinator I want comprehensive traffic management during emergencies and multi-agency coordination so that mass evacuations and emergency incidents are handled effectively.*Components covered:* Mass evacuation protocols, emergency incident diversion, post-incident restoration, multi-agency coordination, construction zone routing, multi-modal coordination, navigation app integration
stories.creator: Austin Alexander

stories.description: As an emergency responder I want automatic vehicle detection and signal preemption capabilities so that emergency vehicles can reach destinations quickly and safely.*Components covered:* Multi-technology emergency vehicle detection, automatic signal preemption, green light corridors, 911 dispatch integration, hospital priority routing, first responder interfaces, emergency override capabilities
stories.creator: Austin Alexander

stories.description: As a logistics coordinator I want specialized routing and priority management for commercial vehicles so that delivery operations are efficient and commercial traffic flows smoothly.*Components covered:* Dynamic route optimization, commercial vehicle detection, logistics system integration, delivery time optimization, freight corridor management, cargo classification, weight-based timing, performance metrics
stories.creator: Austin Alexander

stories.description: As a traffic management supervisor I want regional network integration and operator training capabilities so that we can coordinate with other traffic systems and maintain skilled operators.*Components covered:* Integration with regional traffic management networks, operator training and simulation environments
stories.creator: Austin Alexander

stories.description: As a system administrator I want comprehensive data management and configuration tools with proper access controls so that I can maintain system security, manage configurations, and ensure data integrity.*Components covered:* Multi-user access controls, role-based permissions, historical data storage and retrieval, configuration management, system deployment tools, backup and disaster recovery
stories.creator: Austin Alexander

stories.description: As a traffic control operator I want a centralized dashboard to monitor and control the entire traffic network So that I can efficiently manage traffic flow and respond to incidents across the system.*Components covered:* Centralized traffic operations center dashboard, network-wide signal monitoring and control, real-time performance metrics, system health monitoring with automated alerts
stories.creator: Austin Alexander

stories.description: As a diverse city resident or visitor I want multilingual support and public transportation integration so that I can access traffic information in my preferred language and coordinate with transit systems.*Components covered:* Multi-language support, cultural customization, public transportation integration, schedule coordination, user feedback collection, continuous improvement
stories.creator: Austin Alexander

stories.description: As a commuter or pedestrian I want a mobile application that provides real-time traffic information and system interaction so that I can make informed travel decisions and interact with traffic infrastructure.*Components covered:* Mobile apps, real-time traffic information, signal timing, pedestrian crossing requests, traffic condition reporting, navigation integration, push notifications, offline functionality
stories.creator: Austin Alexander

stories.description: As a person with accessibility needs I want traffic signals and interfaces designed with universal accessibility features So that I can safely navigate intersections and interact with the traffic system regardless of my abilities.*Components covered:* Color-blind accessible displays, high contrast displays, audio signals, tactile feedback, extended crossing times, ADA/WCAG compliance, universal design principles, clear visual hierarchy
stories.creator: Austin Alexander

stories.description: As a city budget manager I want comprehensive inventory management and cost optimization tools so that maintenance operations are cost-effective and resources are efficiently utilized.*Components covered:* Equipment inventory management, spare parts tracking, maintenance cost optimization, budget planning, energy consumption monitoring
stories.creator: Austin Alexander

stories.description: As a public works coordinator I want an integrated system for scheduling maintenance and managing work orders so that maintenance operations are efficient and well-coordinated with city departments.*Components covered:* Equipment lifecycle tracking, replacement planning, maintenance scheduling, work order management, city department integration, automated alerts
stories.creator: Austin Alexander

stories.description: As a maintenance supervisor I want the system to predict equipment failures and automatically detect faults so that I can perform proactive maintenance and minimize system downtime.*Components covered:* Predictive maintenance algorithms, remote diagnostic capabilities, automated fault detection, performance monitoring, component degradation analysis
stories.creator: Austin Alexander

stories.description: As a city environmental officer I want the system to monitor air quality and provide sustainability reporting so that we can track environmental impact and optimize for emission reduction.*Components covered:* Air quality monitoring, emission reduction optimization, environmental impact reporting, smart city integration, climate resilience planning
stories.creator: Austin Alexander

stories.description: As a system administrator I want the system to monitor road surface conditions and trigger appropriate safety protocols so that drivers are warned of hazardous conditions.*Components covered:* Road surface condition monitoring, storm/severe weather emergency protocols
stories.creator: Austin Alexander

stories.description: As a traffic operator I want the system to automatically adjust signal timing and intensity based on real-time weather conditions so that traffic safety is maintained during adverse weather.*Components covered:* Weather station integration, adaptive signal timing, visibility-based adjustments, seasonal daylight adjustment
stories.creator: Austin Alexander

stories.description: As a UI/UX designer, I want to create a user interface that allows operators to monitor system status and manually override signal controls if needed, so that human intervention is possible in special cases.
stories.summary: US-3.5 Develop user interface for monitoring and manual override
stories.creator: Austin Alexander

stories.description: As a developer, I want to implement a priority handling mechanism for emergency and public transport vehicles, so that the system can give them precedence at intersections when necessary.
stories.summary: US-3.4 Integrate priority handling for emergency and public transport vehicles
stories.creator: Austin Alexander

stories.description: As an AI engineer, I want to build an algorithm that dynamically adjusts traffic signal timings based on real-time and predicted traffic conditions, so that traffic flow is optimized and delays are minimized.
stories.summary: US-3.3 Create dynamic signal timing optimization algorithm
stories.creator: Austin Alexander

stories.description: As a data scientist, I want to develop predictive analytics algorithms that forecast traffic flow and congestion, so that the signal control system can proactively optimize signal timings.
stories.summary: US-3.2 Implement predictive analytics for traffic flow forecasting
stories.creator: Austin Alexander

stories.description: As a developer, I want to implement a module that ingests real-time traffic data from sensors and external sources, so that the optimization engine can make informed decisions based on current conditions.
stories.summary: US-3.1 Develop real-time data ingestion module
stories.creator: Austin Alexander

stories.description: As a future GoFast systems engineer, I want a clear structure to data access so that I can effectively maintain and migrate existing technology and reduce overall workload.
stories.parent: Real-time Traffic Detection & Data Collection Platform
stories.summary: US-2.3 Streamline data API and scope accessibility
stories.creator: Preston D

stories.description: Develop simulation scenarios to test autonomous vehicle coordination at intersections, ensuring safe and efficient traffic flow.
stories.creator: Austin Alexander

stories.description: As a system engineer, I want to implement real-time data processing capabilities, so that the system can handle and respond to V2I messages with minimal latency.
stories.summary: US-1 Integrate autonomous vehicle sensor data
stories.creator: Austin Alexander

stories.description: As a developer, I want to integrate coordination algorithms for autonomous vehicles, so that vehicles can interact safely and efficiently at intersections managed by the traffic light automation system.
stories.summary: US-2 Implement Autonomous Vehicle Coordination Algorithms
stories.creator: Austin Alexander

stories.description: As a user, I want to have a dashboard that visualizes real-time traffic data so that traffic conditions and vehicle patterns can be easily monitored.
stories.parent: Real-time Traffic Detection & Data Collection Platform
stories.summary: US-2.4 Create dashboard for visualizing real-time traffic data
stories.creator: Preston D

stories.description: As a developer, I want to integrate the collected sensor data with the central data platform so that all traffic information is available for analysis and visualization.
stories.parent: Real-time Traffic Detection & Data Collection Platform
stories.summary: US-2.1 Integrate sensor data with central data platform
stories.creator: Preston D

stories.description: As a QA engineer, I want to test the sensor network to ensure data accuracy and reliability so that the system provides trustworthy traffic information.
stories.parent: Real-time Traffic Detection & Data Collection Platform
stories.summary: US-2.2 Test sensor network for data accuracy and reliability
stories.creator: Preston D

stories.description: As a compliance officer, I want to define and enforce data protection and encryption protocols for all sensitive data in transit and at rest, so that I can ensure compliance with data protection regulations and prevent data breaches.
stories.summary: US-1.4 Establish Data Protection and Encryption Protocols
stories.creator: Preston D

stories.description: As a security analyst, I want to perform a comprehensive risk assessment of the traffic control infrastructure, so that I can identify vulnerabilities and prioritize mitigation strategies.
stories.summary: US-1.1 Conduct Security Risk Assessment for Traffic Control Infrastructure
stories.creator: Preston D

stories.description: As a systems engineer, I want to design and implement fail-safe mechanisms within the traffic control system, so that I can ensure continued safe operation in the event of a system failure or cyber incident.
stories.summary: US-1.2 Implement Fail-Safe Mechanisms for Traffic Control Operations
stories.creator: Preston D

stories.description: As a public safety official, I want accredited reviews from a trusted party to improve public opinion and trust.
stories.summary: US-1.5 Prepare for and Undergo External Security Audit Certification
stories.creator: Preston D

stories.description: Create a detailed plan outlining procedures for identifying, containing, eradicating, and recovering from security incidents to minimize impact and ensure swift restoration of services.
stories.summary: US-1.3 Develop Security Incident Response Plan
stories.creator: Preston D
